entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
